attributes.action: Bring in a law controlling domestic cats and require them to wear an agreed bell.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I am very concerned about the proliferation of domestic cats
and the lack of any controls at all!

Virtually every house has at least two
cats now and these will be free to roam for many hours.

Your garden will be used as a toilet for all the local cats.

Cats kill for fun, they don't need to do it and its not 'nature' as
we would not have wild cats.

I call for:

Householders be given the right to require cat owners to keep their animals under control just like dogs.

All cats that roam to be fitted with a standard bell to at least give wildlife a chance!
This bell must be worn at all time.
